description: Impose changing emissions of RCP2.6-overshoot short lived gas species including CH4, Nox, VOCs and CO.
name: RCP26overShortLivedGasSpecies
rationale: To investigate the implications of a substantial 21st century overshoot in radiative forcing relative to a longer-term target.
longName: Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6 Overshoot Short Lived Gas Species
keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6, future, 21st century, SSP1, RCP2.6 overshoot, NTCF, Short-lived Gas
